name: The (Unofficial) Return to The Innsmouth Conspiracy

achievements.title: A Full Bag
achievements.text: Have both 10 bless and 10 curse tokens in the chaos bag at the same time.

achievements.title: This Guy Again
achievements.text: Over the course of the campaign, defeat the Deep One Bull at least five times.

achievements.title: Off to a Good Start
achievements.text: Finish Pit of Despair with exactly 1 stamina and sanity remaining.

achievements.title: Friend of the People
achievements.text: During The Vanishing of Elina Harper, control all three story assets at the same time.

achievements.title: Run for Your Lives
achievements.text: Finish In Too Deep without defeating a single Deep One enemy.

achievements.title: Good Swimmer
achievements.text: Finish Devil Reef without ever moving the Fishing Vessel, claiming at least one of the three key objectives.

achievements.title: Step on It
achievements.text: During Horror in High Gear, use your car's ability to move faster every single round.

achievements.title: Way Too Cute
achievements.text: During A Light in the Fog, have four Deep One Hatchlings in play at the same time.

achievements.title: Making Your Own Luck
achievements.text: During Lair of Dagon, first get to 10 curse tokens in the chaos bag, then all the way down again to zero curses in the bag.

achievements.title: Go Back to Sleep
achievements.text: During Into the Maelstrom, have both Dagon and Hydra exhausted at the same time during the investigator phase.

achievements.title: Actually Just Here for the Money
achievements.text: Recover the riches of the Deep Ones.

achievements.title: I Do Not Recall This Place
achievements.text: Win The Innsmouth Conspiracy campaign without any entry under "Memories Recovered" in your campaign log.

achievements.title: Total Recall
achievements.text: Win The Innsmouth Conspiracy campaign with sixteen entries under "Memories Recovered" in your campaign log.

achievements.title: Something Smells Fishy
achievements.text: Win The Innsmouth Conspiracy campaign as a Deep One investigator.

achievements.title: Expert Fisherman
achievements.text: Win The Innsmouth Conspiracy campaign on Expert difficulty.
